attributes.release_summary:
# Changelog

## 1.5.2

- Add missing voices supported by Piper (gwryw_gogleddol, bryce, john, norman and paola)

## 1.5.1

- Add voice for English: cori

## 1.5.0

- Add voices for Persian: amir, gyro
- Add voice for Slovenian: artur
- Add voice for Turki
attributes.title: Piper

attributes.release_summary:
# Changelog

## 2.4.0

- Add "auto" for model and beam size (0) to select values based on CPU

## 2.3.1

- Move `turbo` down the list closer to `large` to avoid confusion

## 2.3.0

- Bump `wyoming-whisper` to 2.3.0 (`faster-whisper` to 1.1.0)
- Supports
attributes.title: Whisper

attributes.release_summary:
## 2025.3.3

- [display] Don't assume glyph x_offset is zero. [esphome#8473](https://github.com/esphome/esphome/pull/8473) by [@clydebarrow](https://github.com/clydebarrow)
- Bump ESP mdns to 1.8.2 [esphome#8482](https://github.com/esphome/esphome/pull/84
attributes.title: ESPHome Device Builder

attributes.release_summary:
# Changelog

## 1.3.0

- Add Coqui STT
- Support range fractions in custom sentences (https://github.com/OHF-Voice/speech-to-phrase/issues/5)
- Do full re-train at startup (https://github.com/OHF-Voice/speech-to-phrase/issues/11)
- Remove websocket comman
attributes.title: Speech-to-Phrase

attributes.release_summary:
# Changelog

## 6.5.0

- Update base image to Debian 12 (bookworm)
- Update mosquitto to version 2.0.20
- Update mosquitto-go-auth to version 2.1.0
- Update libwebsockets to version 4.3.3

## 6.4.1

- Increase default max_queued_messages to 8192 to fix dr
attributes.title: Mosquitto broker

attributes.friendly_name: Home Assistant Voice 093f20 Finished speaking detection

attributes.release_summary:
* Allow starting conversations from Home Assistant (requires HA 2025.4+)
* Support playing a media file before an announcement (requires HA 2025.4+)
* Fixes audio glitches when decoding certain FLAC files
* Reduce memory and CPU load when playing audio
attributes.title: Nabu Casa.Home Assistant Voice PE
